title: I'VE HAD IT WITH 400PING AND D/C EVERYGAME!
body: Every game for the past week has been with 300-400 ping it. It doesn't drop below 200 ever. Randomly my ping will shoot up to 5000 and I'll get D/C this isn't ever so often, no this is 8-9 a game. In the past when I would get high ping it was only for a day at the most then it would go back down to 70. Before the servers where changed I was getting 16 ping. It was great. I have change computers over that 2 years, each getting better and better. But when it comes to league my ping and fps are so low. Before this 400 ping problem I had 30fps with 70 ping. I've tried the things on the riotgames support site. That are suppose to help. They haven't made anything better, everything is just the same. right now every game is 7fps 400 ping. It's gotten to the point where I'm about to quit playing since I can't play it. All the other games I play I get 60fps and everything is fine. When I play I only have league open. I have all settings on lowest they can be. I don't play with sound at all. If anyone can help me I would greatly appreciate it. I would hate to have to quit league because of this.

replies.body: Sometimes those weird random ping spikes can be attributed to packet loss instead of a bad connection. I'd like to check there first, since that will tell us more about how we should troubleshoot. Hit up our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and toss your recent game logs which had these ping spikes in. Take a screenshot using something like Gyazo and paste it here for us to go over together.

Sorry for the late reply. I've been a little busy lately. Here are the screenshots you asked for.

The last couple weeks:  https://gyazo.com/0a30543252c8d5a9b497c8c5e4f7f356 https://gyazo.com/706cde58cc42353411c09e0f26fe4975 https://gyazo.com/344059a6af49a30c73f150eaf4abd0fb https://gyazo.com/d692cc1ee0e5bbbad660fdc3a4b0659e

About 3 weeks ago: https://gyazo.com/f8a36eb8fd24873ff5481def20233b47


As you can see my ping has gone up at substantial rate. I have not downloaded anything big. I run all my other game just fine. But for some reason league isn't responding.

Yea it looks like this is actually an issue with packet loss after all. Sometimes we can adjust some of your network settings to help, and other times it ends up being on the ISP side of things. Hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they might be able to walk you through some steps to help out!
on the request form, What Type Of Technical Issue Are You Experiencing?, which option do I select?
The second option doesn't matter too much, since picking Technical Issues will get you over to the tech guys. I believe one of the options is connection issues so I'd go with the closest one to that.
